title: Crypto Library
author: Crypto Library
created_time: March 04, 2023, 09:35:53 PMLast edit: March 07, 2023, 07:22:04 AM by Crypto Library
content: Hello Buddies Recently I ranked up to Sr. Member, and I already have the wished that after becoming ¬†Sr. member, I will exchange some love with the forum members. So I thought what could be the better option rather than BTC to share love with bitcointalk forumers. And so now I am organizing to give that treat with few amount of BTC.This is my first giveaway so I didn't know much about this and that's why I created a topic some days ago I am thankful to those who explained me the methods.For making this giveaway Fair and clean here I put some terms for participate:Only Member,+ with 10 earned merits in the last 120 will be eligible.No Alt There will be two winners each person will get 0.0005 BTC The dead time for Applying 7th of March at 06:00 pm UTCValid red tag more than positive were excluded(late added)For selecting winners I will use https://bitcoindata.science/giveaway-manager/ ¬†Thank you bitmover for making it easy . Kindly apply on this format:Code:BTT Username:BTC ady:Welcome Buddies
